entry.content:
---
title: tags
date: 2021-10-16 23:40:50
---

# HTML DOM

# 1. 改变 HTML 输出流

# document.write()

可用于直接向 HTML 输出流写内容

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625050879923.png" alt="1625050879923" style="zoom:67%;" />

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625050907398.png" alt="1625050907398" style="zoom:67%;" />

# 2. 改变 HTML 内容

# document.getElementById("img")

# .innerHTML

使用 DOM 来获得 ID 元素，innerHTML 改变元素内容

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625051627466.png" alt="1625051627466" style="zoom:67%;" />

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625051646187.png" alt="1625051646187" style="zoom:67%;" />

# 3. 改变 HTML 属性

# img src="aa.jpg" --->document.getElementById("img")

# .src="aa.gif";

# 4. 改变 css

# 改变 HTML 样式

# document.getElementById("p")

# .style.color="deeppink";

改变字体颜色

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625052670555.png" alt="1625052670555" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击按钮，改变字体颜色

点击前

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625054344497.png" alt="1625054344497" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击后

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625054364390.png" alt="1625054364390" style="zoom:67%;" />

# 5. 事件

# onclick

点击文本，改变文本内容

method1

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625054137447.png" alt="1625054137447" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击前

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625054157022.png" alt="1625054157022" style="zoom: 67%;" />

点击后

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625054178725.png" alt="1625054178725" style="zoom:67%;" />

method2

# 从事件处理器调用函数

# function

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625054884829.png" alt="1625054884829" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击前

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625054961320.png" alt="1625054961320" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击后

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625054989699.png" alt="1625054989699" style="zoom:67%;" />

# 事件属性

点击按钮，执行函数 改变 p 的内容

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625055524944.png" alt="1625055524944" style="zoom: 67%;" />

点击前

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625055555117.png" alt="1625055555117" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击后

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625055573562.png" alt="1625055573562" style="zoom:67%;" />

# 事件分配

点击按钮，执行函数 改变 p 的内容

点击前

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625069146027.png" alt="1625069146027" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击后

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625069207206.png" alt="1625069207206" style="zoom:67%;" />

# onload 和 onunload 事件

用户在进入或离开页面时被触发

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625070060198.png" alt="1625070060198" style="zoom:67%;" />

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625070088320.png" alt="1625070088320" style="zoom:67%;" />

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625070113073.png" alt="1625070113073" style="zoom: 67%;" />

# onchange 事件

用于输入字段的验证

将大写转换为小写

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625072867152.png" alt="1625072867152" style="zoom:67%;" />

# onmouseover 和 onmouseout 事件

鼠标移至元素上方和移除时触发函数

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625072975280.png" alt="1625072975280" style="zoom:67%;" />

移至元素上方

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625073009891.png" alt="1625073009891" style="zoom:67%;" />

移出元素上方

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625073041226.png" alt="1625073041226" style="zoom:67%;" />

# onmousedown 和 onmouseup 事件

鼠标点击和释放时触发的事件

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625073088174.png" alt="1625073088174" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625073302923.png" alt="1625073302923" style="zoom:67%;" />

释放

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625073326240.png" alt="1625073326240" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击后

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625073344531.png" alt="1625073344531" style="zoom:67%;" />

# 6.EventListener

# addEventListener () 方法

在按钮中添加事件

点击按钮，执行函数

点击前

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625121710485.png" alt="1625121710485" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击后

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625121762050.png" alt="1625121762050" style="zoom:67%;" />

# 向原元素添加事件句柄

使用函数名，引用外部函数

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625122171663.png" alt="1625122171663" style="zoom: 67%;" />

点击前

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625122223653.png" alt="1625122223653" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击后

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625122244751.png" alt="1625122244751" style="zoom: 50%;" />

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625122406831.png" alt="1625122406831" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击前

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625122471546.png" alt="1625122471546" style="zoom:67%;" />

点击后

<img src="C:\Users\86138\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\1625122491183.png" alt="1625122491183" style="zoom:67%;" />

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
